transcript.p: Runaway from David L. Ward, living at Mann’s lick, on the 3rd of September, a Negro man, named DICK, between 35 and 40 years of age, about five feet 8 or 10 inches high, yellowish complexion, somewhat bald, the little finger on the right hand and the next to it grows together and is crooked. I am informed a fellow of his description was seen between Lebanon and Chillicothe, and says he was set free by a Mr James Suggelt, a baptist preacher near Georgetown, kent. He is an arch fellow, and in all probability has obtained a pass and changed his name. The above reward will be given to any person who will deliver the said fellow to the subscriber living near Georgetown, Kent. or twenty dollars to confine him in any jail so that I may get him.

rewardInfo.criteria: deliver the said fellow to the subscriber living near Georgetown, Kent. or twenty dollars to confine him in any jail
